title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
tracting Lae'zel's tadpole, the zaith'isk nearly killed her. We should talk with her about it.

Take Lae'zel to the Inquisitor.

Lae'zel believes the zaith'isk was tampered with and is eager to inform the Inquisitor at the creche. We should escort her to him.

Defeat Ch'r'ai W'wargaz.

Ch'r'ai W'wargaz demanded that we hand over the artefact. and attacked us when we tL., must defeat him.

Return to the Inquisitor's chamber.

Ch'r'ai W'wargaz is defeated. We should examine his chamber for more in
